name: tailored.js
description: A small library providing various utility functions used in tailored apps backends (propably not very useful for anyone else)

scripts.preversion: npm run babel:transpile && git add ./*.js && (git commit -m "transpile" || echo "skipping transpile commit") && npm run lint && npm run test

author: Michael Smesnik <ms@tailored-apps.com>, Stephan Schmid <stephan@tailored-apps.com>
